+import %7B writeFile, mkdir %7D from 'fs/promises';%0D%0Aimport %7B join %7D from 'path';%0D%0Aimport %7B existsSync %7D from 'fs';%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Downloads an avatar image from a URL and saves it locally%0D%0A * @param imageUrl - The URL of the image to download%0D%0A * @param userId - The user ID to create a unique filename%0D%0A * @returns The local path to the saved image%0D%0A */%0D%0Aexport async function downloadAndSaveAvatar(imageUrl: string, userId: string): Promise%3Cstring%3E %7B%0D%0A  try %7B%0D%0A    // Create uploads directory if it doesn't exist%0D%0A    const uploadsDir = join(process.cwd(), 'public/uploads');%0D%0A    if (!existsSync(uploadsDir)) %7B%0D%0A      await mkdir(uploadsDir, %7B recursive: true %7D);%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    // Fetch the image%0D%0A    const response = await fetch(imageUrl);%0D%0A    if (!response.ok) %7B%0D%0A      throw new Error(%60Failed to fetch image: $%7Bresponse.statusText%7D%60);%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    // Get the image data%0D%0A    const imageBuffer = await response.arrayBuffer();%0D%0A    const buffer = Buffer.from(imageBuffer);%0D%0A%0D%0A    // Determine file extension from content type or URL%0D%0A    const contentType = response.headers.get('content-type');%0D%0A    let extension = 'jpg'; // default%0D%0A    if (contentType?.includes('png')) extension = 'png';%0D%0A    else if (contentType?.includes('gif')) extension = 'gif';%0D%0A    else if (contentType?.includes('webp')) extension = 'webp';%0D%0A%0D%0A    // Create filename%0D%0A    const filename = %60avatar-$%7BuserId%7D-$%7BDate.now()%7D.$%7Bextension%7D%60;%0D%0A    const filePath = join(uploadsDir, filename);%0D%0A%0D%0A    // Save the file%0D%0A    await writeFile(filePath, buffer);%0D%0A%0D%0A    // Return the public URL%0D%0A    return %60/uploads/$%7Bfilename%7D%60;%0D%0A  %7D catch (error) %7B%0D%0A    console.error('Error downloading avatar:', error);%0D%0A    // Return the original URL as fallback%0D%0A    return imageUrl;%0D%0A  %7D%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Validates if a URL is from a trusted avatar source%0D%0A * @param url - The URL to validate%0D%0A * @returns True if the URL is from a trusted source%0D%0A */%0D%0Aexport function isTrustedAvatarSource(url: string): boolean %7B%0D%0A  const trustedDomains = %5B%0D%0A    'lh3.googleusercontent.com',%0D%0A    'avatars.githubusercontent.com',%0D%0A    'gravatar.com',%0D%0A    'secure.gravatar.com'%0D%0A  %5D;%0D%0A  %0D%0A  try %7B%0D%0A    const urlObj = new URL(url);%0D%0A    return trustedDomains.some(domain =%3E urlObj.hostname.includes(domain));%0D%0A  %7D catch %7B%0D%0A    return false;%0D%0A  %7D%0D%0A%7D
